sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.PmConsoleReferenceHelper</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Reference Helper(s) for Console Tables</description>
        <name>PmConsoleReferenceHelper</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var PmConsoleReferenceHelper = Class.create();
PmConsoleReferenceHelper.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

    consoleTableReference: function(_current) {
        //gs.info("Into consoleTableReference: " + _current.getValue("pm_console_display_column"));
        if(JSUtil.notNil(_current.getValue("pm_console_display_column"))) {
            var consoleId = _current.pm_console_display_column.getRefRecord().getValue("pm_console");
            //gs.info("consoleId: " + consoleId);
            var tableIds = [];
            var gr = new GlideRecord("pm_console_table");
            gr.addQuery("pm_console", consoleId);
            gr.query();
            while(gr.next()) {
                tableIds.push(gr.getValue("sys_id"));
            }
            //gs.info("tableIds: " + tableIds.join(","));
            return "sys_idIN" + tableIds.join(",");
        }
        return "";
    },

    type: 'PmConsoleReferenceHelper'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2016-05-24 23:03:20</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>5227069a9f231200598a5bb0657fcf66</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>PmConsoleReferenceHelper</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Planned Task_v2" source="com.snc.planned_task_v2">e93557642fc10110d8a4d5f62799b623</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_5227069a9f231200598a5bb0657fcf66</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2016-05-24 23:22:56</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>947</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
